2007.context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. Founded. Pioneered consumer cloud file sync.

competitors.name: Box
competitors.notes: Founded 2005, two years before Dropbox, enterprise-focused

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Released in 2007, same year as Dropbox founded

competitors.name: Google
competitors.notes: In cloud storage space since early 2000s

competitors.name: Egnyte
competitors.notes: Also founded 2007, enterprise solutions for various industries

2010.context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. Rapid consumer growth. Freemium model success.

2015.context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. Enterprise focus growing. Dropbox Business launched.

competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: 15 GB free storage vs Dropbox's 2 GB, Google Workspace integration

competitors.name: Box
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused with 10 GB free storage, enhanced security

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: 1TB cloud storage, integrated with Microsoft Office

competitors.name: MEGA
competitors.notes: Launched 2013, 50 GB free storage, secure file storage

competitors.notes: Focused on security and privacy

competitors.name: pCloud
competitors.notes: Secure cloud storage services

competitors.name: Tresorit
competitors.notes: Swiss-based, high security standards

competitors.name: ownCloud
competitors.notes: Self-hosted storage for data privacy and control

2020.context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. Virtual-first company. Document workflows expansion.

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Bundled with Microsoft 365, dominant in enterprise

competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: Integrated with Google Workspace

competitors.name: Box
competitors.notes: Enterprise content management focus

competitors.name: Apple iCloud
competitors.notes: Consumer cloud storage for Apple users

competitors.name: Amazon Drive
competitors.notes: Cloud storage from AWS

2024.context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. Dash AI-powered universal search. Document collaboration.

competitors.name: Google Drive
competitors.notes: 15 GB free vs Dropbox 2 GB, better collaboration and value

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Office 365 integration, comparable features

competitors.name: MEGA

competitors.name: pCloud
competitors.notes: Zero-knowledge encryption, one-time payment model

competitors.name: Sync.com
competitors.notes: User-friendly, robust security, reliable file syncing

competitors.name: Tresorit
competitors.notes: Best for business with compliance certifications

competitors.name: Icedrive

competitors.name: Internxt
competitors.notes: Privacy-focused alternative

competitors.name: Box
competitors.notes: Enterprise-focused with enhanced security and collaboration

competitors.name: Nextcloud
competitors.notes: Collaboration solution for consumers and businesses

competitors.name: IDrive
competitors.notes: Top online backup service with syncing and file sharing

2025.context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. AI-powered work assistant. Competing with Google Drive, Microsoft.
